title: Mom for City Council
description: Jasmine's mom is tired of problems in the town of Springfield not being fixed, so Jasmine convinces her to do something about it by running for city council. Mom for City Council gives students a look at how Jasmine's mom runs for office to be part of city government. Students will learn the steps in the process of running for city council. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and identify and use homophones.
